title: PowerShell MCP Server Capabilities and Usage
body:
The PowerShell MCP Server (mcp_powershell-mc_*) provides comprehensive PowerShell execution with advanced security, metrics, and analysis capabilities:

## Core Functions:
- **run-powershell**: Execute PowerShell scripts/commands with security classification
- **powershell-syntax-check**: Validate PowerShell syntax with Script Analyzer integration
- **server-stats**: Monitor performance metrics and command statistics
- **help**: Get contextual help and usage guidance

## Security Features:
- Multi-tier classification: SAFE, RISKY, DANGEROUS, CRITICAL, UNKNOWN, BLOCKED
- Confirmation gates for risky operations
- Working directory policy enforcement
- Authentication via MCP_AUTH_KEY environment variable

## Performance Monitoring:
- Command execution metrics (duration, p95 percentiles)
- PowerShell process metrics (CPU, memory)
- Overflow detection and handling
- Timeout management with adaptive extensions

## Syntax Analysis:
- PowerShell Script Analyzer integration (PWSH_SYNTAX_ANALYZER=1)
- Real-time syntax validation
- Best practice recommendations
- Rule-based diagnostics with severity levels

## Environment Configuration:
- MCP_CAPTURE_PS_METRICS=1: Enable performance capture
- PWSH_SYNTAX_ANALYZER=1: Enable syntax analyzer
- METRICS_PORT=9090: Metrics endpoint
- Timeout defaults to 90s, configurable via timeoutSeconds parameter
